page.title: 03Flooding on Shoreham Beach
page.content: 'Do you think that the Southern Water Authority is doing a good job to protect Shoreham Beach?'was next asked.Replies were balanced with one person saying that 'They do the best they can with the money they get'. The final question was 'Who should pay for the improvements to the beach?' The answers were 'everyone on the beach','All of Shoreham','Adur Council','The region','The Southern Water Authority.' Most people in general do not mind living on Shoreham Beach as there seems to be more advantages than disadvantages.The other questions are really a matter of opinion.
